sticky-image-description: Get the top news from across Pennsylvania, plus some fun and a puzzle, all in one free daily email newsletter.
support-text: I hope you appreciated this article. Before you move on, I wanted to ask if you would consider supporting Spotlight PA's nonprofit journalism in what will be a pivotal year for Pennsylvania. Our 2024 coverage will be unlike anything you’ll find anywhere else. We’ll cover all angles of the upcoming election, focused squarely on the stakes for voters, not the horse race. We’ll continue to hold the Shapiro administration and our state legislature accountable. And we’ll deliver insightful investigative and explanatory journalism about urgent statewide issues and policies. Across this country, a small number of billionaire owners and mega corporations have a powerful hold on so much of the information that reaches the public about what’s happening. Spotlight PA is different. We have no billionaire owner or shareholders to consider. Our journalism is produced to serve the public interest – not profit motives. That's why we need your help. Your support enables us to continue to produce unique investigative and public-service reporting that demands accountability, inspires changes, and strengthens democracy. Quality reporting is a public good, not a commodity to be bought and sold. That’s why we share it at no cost with more than 100 newsroom partners in your community and communities across the state. Our readers keep us independent, beholden to no outside influence, and accessible to all – whether they can afford to pay for news, or not. Consider making a tax-deductible contribution now to enable this work to continue, or better yet, support us with a sustaining monthly gift. Please make a gift now. With gratitude, Christopher Baxter Editor, Spotlight PA PS: If you prefer to mail a check, you can send it to: Spotlight PA, PO Box 11728, Harrisburg, PA 17108-1728
takeover-dek: Hurry a gift in support of trusted, nonpartisan journalism before our DOUBLE match expires at 11:59 p.m. tonight! Can we count on you now?
takeover-hed: Only 12 hours left to support Spotlight PA
